item.title: Uber invests $100M in WeRide to fuel robotaxi expansion across 15 more cities
item.description: Uber has committed $100 million to Chinese robotaxi firm WeRide as they expand to 15 more cities.

item.title: CrowdStrike says it will lay off 500 workers
item.description: The cybersecurity company said it will lay off 5% of its global workforce.
